-- | Code from leanpub.com/finding-success-in-haskell
--   
--   Implementation of code from Finding Success in Haskell by Julie
--   Moronuki and Chris Martin
@package userapp
@version 0.5.0


module UserLib
newtype Error
Error :: [Text] -> Error
newtype Password
Password :: Text -> Password
data User
User :: Username -> Password -> User
newtype Username
Username :: Text -> Username
type Rule a = (a -> Validation Error a)
makeUser :: Username -> Password -> Validation Error User
checkLength :: Int -> Rule Text
checkPasswordLength :: Rule Password
checkUsernameLength :: Rule Username
cleanWhitespace :: Rule Text
display :: Username -> Password -> IO ()
parsePassword :: Rule Password
parseUsername :: Rule Username
requireAlphaNum :: Rule Text
validatePassword :: Rule Password
validateUsername :: Rule Username
instance GHC.Base.Semigroup UserLib.Error
instance GHC.Show.Show UserLib.Error
instance GHC.Classes.Eq UserLib.Error
instance GHC.Show.Show UserLib.Username
instance GHC.Classes.Eq UserLib.Username
instance GHC.Show.Show UserLib.Password
instance GHC.Classes.Eq UserLib.Password
instance GHC.Show.Show UserLib.User
instance GHC.Classes.Eq UserLib.User
